ygData.subject: Re: Hello All
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a lvl 41 Halfling Druid. Haven t purchased LDoN yet, as I most often play solo and don t know that I would use it. Have everything up to this expansion,
ygData.messageBody:
I am a lvl 41 Halfling Druid. Haven't purchased LDoN yet, as I most
often play solo and don't know that I would use it. Have everything up
to this expansion, but am not convinced that it is worthwhile. Sounds
very nice, but I have had two guilds I have been a part of fade away,
and this sounds like something best suited to guilds.

Barto Proudfoot
Zeb server

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Masteradept" <masteradept007@y...>
wrote:
> I wanted to say Hello to all of my fellow addicts....Heya. My main
> is a 45th Halfling Druid on Kane Bayle. Unfourtantly I am in
> maryland and our power is out because of Isabella...(damn her). So
> I'm looking at stuff from work and wondering if anyone does not like
> LDoN? if so Why?
>
> Estro Runeweaver
